JobFullDesc:
You Lead the Way. We’ve Got Your Back. 
At American Express, we know that with the right backing, people and businesses have the power to progress in incredible ways.  Whether we’re supporting our customers’ financial confidence to move ahead, taking commerce to new heights, or encouraging people to explore the world, our colleagues are constantly redefining what’s possible - and we’re proud to back each other every step of the way. When you join #TeamAmex, you become part of a diverse community of over 60,000 colleagues, all with a common goal to deliver an exceptional customer experience every day.
At American Express we are focused on providing the best customer experience everyday through a differentiated set of products and services. The Amex AI Labs of American Express Corporation is looking for a Director to lead an accomplished team of scientists in the field of Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Machine Learning (ML) with focus on developing enterprise-grade data science capabilities in natural language processing (NLP) and conversational AI to support customer servicing automation across all digital channels, in close partnership with Technology. Major Business applications include interactive virtual responses (iVR), email servicing, mobile search etc. 
AI Labs is a dynamic and rewarding workplace which started in 2012 and is currently co-located in New York and India and is comprised of dynamic and talented researchers with Ph.D. or Master’s degree from top tier institutes having expertise in AI/ML technologies. AI Labs vision is to be an enabler of AI/ML across the company, by creating and managing novel and effective AI and ML capabilities and solutions. 
We are looking for candidates who has a proven track record of developing innovative machine learning solutions to deliver exceptional customer experiences and incremental business values, as well as the potential to build and cultivate a data science team. The detailed responsibilities of this role include:

Manage and grow a data science team with the focus on developing enterprise-grade NLP/conversational AI capabilities.
Define the vision and long-term strategy of the core data science capabilities to further accelerate automation processes in customer servicing.
Build strong partnership with multiple stakeholders across AMEX to revolutionize customer servicing experiences across all digital channels with a data-driven approach
Uplift the innovation and cutting-edge R&D in unstructured data modeling, one of the most dynamic and fast-growing area in today’s AI community
Work with senior leadership teams to explore and identify opportunities to democratize and expand the existing capabilities to tackle new business challenges. 


Masters/PhDs in a quantitative field (Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Physics, Operation Research and etc.)


5+ years of hands-on experiences in machine learning modeling, NLP and conversational AI
A strong record of delivering machine learning and/or data products including defining business problems, identifying data strategy, building MVPs, and scaling prototypes to production solutions 
Familiarity and proficiency with agile methods and tools to support project management in a timeline sensitive environment 
Team player with strong communication and leadership skills
Strong interest in recruiting and coaching technical teams 

Employment eligibility to work with American Express in the U.S. is required as the company will not pursue visa sponsorship for these positions
